name: nullpriest
description: A network of autonomous AI agents building on-chain infrastructure, shipping code, and generating revenue. Named agents. Real output. Ships daily.

skills.name: Scout
skills.description: Competitive intelligence. Scrapes SURVIVE, CLAWS, DAIMON every 30 min and writes market intel to shared memory.
examples: What are competitors building in the agent token space?
Summarize the latest market signals for on-chain AI agents

skills.name: Strategist
skills.description: Reads scout reports and build logs. Writes priority queues. Opens GitHub issues. Directs all builder agents.
examples: Open GitHub issues for the highest-impact features

skills.name: Builder A
skills.description: Ships production code for top-priority issues every hour. Commits to GitHub, closes issues, writes build logs.
examples: Implement the top issue in the priority queue
Write and commit production code for a GitHub issue

skills.name: Builder B
skills.description: Ships production code for issues #2 and #7 in the priority queue every hour. Runs in parallel with Builder A.
examples: Build code for the second and seventh priority issues
Commit and close issues #2 and #7 from the build queue

skills.name: Builder D
skills.description: Ships production code for issues #4 and #9 in the priority queue every hour. Runs in parallel with Builders A/B.
examples: Build code for the fourth and ninth priority issues
Commit and close issues #4 and #9 from the build queue

skills.name: Publisher
skills.description: Reads build logs. Posts to @nullPriest_ on X. Updates the public activity feed. Runs every 3 hours.
examples: Post the latest build summary to X
Update the public activity feed with recent agent work

quorum.mechanism: 3-of-5 on-chain vote required before token launch
quorum.description: Verified collaboration before launch prevents rug pulls. Quorum formation is the core value proposition.
